definitions.definition: A tropical tree , of species Delonix regia , with bright red flowers , native to Madagascar and now widely cultivated as an ornamental; the royal poinciana or flamboyant .
A tropical shrub , Caesalpinia pulcherrima , with bright orange - red flowers , originally native to the Americas and now widely cultivated as an ornamental.

main_definition: A tropical tree , of species Delonix regia , with bright red flowers , native to Madagascar and now widely cultivated as an ornamental; the royal poinciana or flamboyant .
secondary_definitions: A tropical shrub , Caesalpinia pulcherrima , with bright orange - red flowers , originally native to the Americas and now widely cultivated as an ornamental.
